main event: Observers reported multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects in various locations from 1952 to 1956.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and silver, glowing, and revolving around a central axis., Observations indicated that objects were seen through intermittent clouds., One report mentions an object following an aerial balloon before accelerating away at high speed., Visibility conditions varied, with some reports stating clear weather and unlimited visibility., The sightings were part of a larger investigation by the Project Blue Book program.
location: Daffa, Ireland; Spokane, Washington, USA; Guam, USA
witness description: Military observers and weather station personnel
